snippet: Prime Minister Victor Ponta will face Klaus Iohannis, the ethnic German mayor of Sibiu, on Nov. 16.
abstract: Romanian Prime Min Victor Ponta, favorite to replace Traian Basescu as president, has been forced into runoff after failing to capture majority of votes in election that was closer than expected; Klaus Iohannis finishes strong second.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Victor Ponta will face Klaus Iohannis, the ethnic German mayor of Sibiu, on Nov. 16.

headline.main: Romanian Premier Faces Runoff in Presidential Race
